channel.title: Writeups on John Woodman's Security Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Writeups on John Woodman's Security Blog

item.title: HackTheBox: Writeup
item.description: Box Type: Linux Getting User Nmap scan showed ports 22 and 80 open. Checking out the website shows a notification that some sort of DoS protection is running on the webserver, likely preventing any dictionary or brute force attacks, which means no dirb :(. The Nmap scan did show a robots.txt, however: Navigating to /writeup shows a home page with writeups for other retired boxes: Using wappalyzer, it showed that this webpage was running “CMS Made Simple”.
